org.svvrl.goal.gui

Class SplitTreeTab

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.svvrl.goal.gui.Tab
              • org.svvrl.goal.gui.SplitTreeTab
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, EditableListener

    public class SplitTreeTab
extends Tab
    This class provides a tab for displaying a split tree. This tab is divided into three panels. The upper panel show the input sequence. The lower left panel displays the automaton owning the split tree. The lower right panel displays the split tree.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
